DialogueText:
Falloween is meant to be scary and what's scarier than death right? Go kill some monsters!
QUEST:Defeat monsters without having AUTO turned on.

Falloween is meant to be scary and what's scarier than death right? Go kill some monsters!
QUEST:Defeat monsters AFK gains don't count.

Hmm still not scared eh? Well let's see if you can stomach the sheer terror of a RECYCLED QUEST!
QUEST:Defeat monsters without having AUTO turned on.

Hmm still not scared eh? Well let's see if you can stomach the sheer terror of a RECYCLED QUEST!
QUEST:Defeat monsters AFK gains don't count.
No real gamer does everything for themself! Go create a 2nd character! QUEST:Reach Lv 5 then create a 2nd character! Use them to gather materials for you while you play on your main character!!

No real gamer does everything themself!
QUEST:Reach Lv 5 then create a 2nd character! They gather resources WHILE you play on your 1st character!!

Did you get all of that? I'll add a Hint to your codex about Talent Points if you ever forget. Now go spend those points!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

I'll add a Hint to your codex if you want more info. Now go spend those pts!
MAIN QUEST:Spend 5 Talent Points

Speaking of quests I'm the main quest giver and here comes your first mission!
MAIN QUEST:Go to the right and defeat 5 green spores.

Here's your first quest!
MAIN QUEST:Go to the right and defeat 5 green spores.

Now lets find you some tougher monsters! Defeat enough spores to unlock the next map. Can't have a promising player like you stuck in one place!
MAIN QUEST:Reach map 2

Now lets find you some tougher monsters!
MAIN QUEST:Defeat Green Mushrooms and reach the next map!

Go check out that portal on the left. There's a cheerful goblin who will show you some new gameplay! I haven't actually seen him in a while but I bet he is as happy as I remember!
MAIN QUEST:Get Glumlee's Certification. He's in the Left Portal!

You need some ores to make better equiment...
MAIN QUEST:Go through the LEFT portal to start mining and do Glumlee's quests to get the Certificate!

Now then use what you learned to get the materials needed to craft some new Equipment at the Anvil! Go do that while I go get this certificate framed... or maybe I should get it laminated...
MAIN QUEST:Craft Farmer Brim and Orange Tee

Now use those ores to craft better equipment! You'll also need some logs from the tree in the Mushroom map...
MAIN QUEST:Craft Farmer Brim and Orange Tee

Final task now. Go to the forge click the Yellow Arrow tab in the top right and buy some Upgrades. These are Permanent and are shared between all your characters.
QUEST: Upgrade the forge 3 times

Final task now. Go to the forge and but some permanent upgrades using your coins!
QUEST: Upgrade the forge 2 times

Find who stole my Stamps and I can do business with you!
QUEST:Find out who stole the Stamp Collection they're in the Frog map...

Find who stole my Stamps and I can do business with you!
QUEST:Buy a stamp from the town shop
Good thing for that too because it looks like you could use a promotion what with you being a Beginner and all that! Come talk to me once you're level 10.
Hang on you aren't ready for a promotion. Come talk to me once you're level 10.
